alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 07 at 6:23PM PST until January 07 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Colfax, Quincy, Winchester, Worley, Cheney, Hayden, Ephrata, Wilbur, Ralston, Moscow, Othello, Coeur d`Alene, Uniontown, Tekoa, Odessa, Moses Lake, Rockford, Rosalia, Coulee City, Spokane, Creston, Grand Coulee, Electric City, La Crosse, Lamona, Post Falls, Harrington, Davenport, Potlatch, Plummer, Genesee, Stratford, Oakesdale, Pullman, Ritzville, Coulee Dam. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Spokane Area; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse
